actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of designating the study area as the Black Metropolis National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
short_title: Black Metropolis National Heritage Area Study Act
subjects: Urban and suburban affairs and development

summary.text: Black Metropolis National Heritage Area Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the feasibility of designating a specified region in Chicago, Illinois, as the Black Metropolis National Heritage Area.

titles.title: Black Metropolis National Heritage Area Study Act

To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of designating the study area as the Black Metropolis National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
